Package lib

Class ProcessibleImage

java.lang.Object
lib.ProcessibleImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
RasterReader, RasterWriter
public class ProcessibleImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements RasterReader, RasterWriter
Creates a ProcessibleImage Instance for being processed with an ImageFilter Instance. It contains two ImgRaster one is original raster and one is processed raster.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ImgRaster originalRaster
    ImgRaster instance holding the original image raster data.
    private int pixelType
    Sets during reading of the image file and denotes the type of image pixel format defined in BufferedImage types.
    private ImgRaster processedRaster
    ImgRaster instance holding the processed image raster data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ProcessibleImage​(java.io.File file)
    Creates a new instance of ProcessibleImage from a Image file on disk, provided in parameter.
    ProcessibleImage​(ImgRaster raster)
    Creates a new instance of ProcessibleImage from an existing ImgRaster instance.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ImgRaster getOriginalRaster()
    Returns the original raster instance.
    ImgRaster getProcessedRaster()
    Returns the processed raster instance.
    void read​(java.io.File file)
    Reads a local disk file image and prepares the instance on which it is called.
    void write​(java.io.File file, java.lang.String format)
    Writes the current processed raster instance to the file pointer provided in parameter as image file format specified.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ProcessibleImage

      public ProcessibleImage​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Creates a new instance of ProcessibleImage from a Image file on disk, provided in parameter.
      Parameters:
      file - pointer to the image file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on error while reading the image file.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - on interruption during grabbing pixels from the image.

    • ProcessibleImage

      public ProcessibleImage​(ImgRaster raster)
      Creates a new instance of ProcessibleImage from an existing ImgRaster instance.
      Parameters:
      raster - ImgRaster instance holding image data.

  • Method Details

    • read

      public void read​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Reads a local disk file image and prepares the instance on which it is called.
      Parameters:
      file - pointer to the image file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on error reading the file.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - on interruption during grabbing pixels from the image.

    • write

      public void write​(java.io.File file, java.lang.String format) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes the current processed raster instance to the file pointer provided in parameter as image file format specified.
      Parameters:
      file - pointer to the image file.
      format - of the image
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on error writing to the file.

    • getOriginalRaster

      public ImgRaster getOriginalRaster()
      Returns the original raster instance.
      Returns:
      ImgRaster instance holding the original raster.

    • getProcessedRaster

      public ImgRaster getProcessedRaster()
      Returns the processed raster instance.
      Returns:
      ImgRaster instance holding the processed raster.
